snippet: The American Academy of Neurology said it would emphasize treating concussions on a case-by-case basis, acknowledging they are too idiosyncratic to be neatly categorized.
abstract: American Academy of Neurology publishes revised guidelines for handling concussions in journal Neurology, emphasizing treating athletes case by case rather than according to a predetermined scale; move brings group in line with best practices followed by NFL and other leagues and associations.
lead_paragraph: The American Academy of Neurology said it would emphasize treating concussions on a case-by-case basis, acknowledging they are too idiosyncratic to be neatly categorized.

headline.seo: New Guidelines for Handling Athletes With Concussions
headline.main: New Concussion Guidelines Stress Individual Treatment
headline.print_headline: New Concussion Guidelines Stress Individual Treatment
